item.title: CV
item.description: Pleasure in the job puts perfection in the work Aristotle Programmer with an experience of over 20 years. Backend programming mostly, but I have experience in linux administration and front-end development. I am not limited to coding and trying to do everything possible for the success of the project as a whole.
